You may look at the top card of your library any time.
As long as you hold imperium, you may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library.
{3}{U}: You take imperium. Activate only once. [i](Creatures you cast enter the battlefield with an extra +1/+1 counter. You lose imperium at the end of your turn if you didn’t attack or cast a creature spell.)[/i]
